useIntegratorBase.title: Use PHP Integrator Base Settings
useIntegratorBase.description: When installed alongside the PHP Integrator Base package, keep settings in one place.

phpCommand.title: PHP command
phpCommand.description: The path to your PHP binary (e.g. /usr/bin/php, php, ...).

phpExtensions.title: Path to XDebug extension
phpExtensions.description: The full path to xdebug.so or xdebug.dll will enable it to be toggled.

phpUnitPath.title: Path to phpunit
phpUnitPath.description: The path to your phpunit binary (e.g. /usr/bin/phpunit, phpunit, ...).

additionalCommandParameters.title: Additional command line parameters
additionalCommandParameters.description: A space separated list of command line arguments/options for the phpunit binary.

alwaysOpen.title: Always Open
alwaysOpen.description: Open panel when opening the editor.

gotoTest.title: Auto Navigate
gotoTest.description: Navigate to the test class/method when running individual test cases.

openView.title: Auto Open
openView.description: Open the panel when running test using keyboard shortcuts.

enableTreeView.title: Tree View Integration
enableTreeView.description: Show code coverage in atoms tree view.

errorLines.title: Display Error Lines
errorLines.description: The number of error output lines to display in the tree panel (0 for all lines).
